body.name: FOAOOD Security Cameras Wireless Outdoor - Solar Cameras for Home Security & Battery Camera Wireless with Color Night Vision PIR Human Detection 2-Way Talk IP66 Waterproof Only 2.4G WiFi
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 1 hr 38 mins
features: 【Solar Charging & 5000mAh Built-in Battery】FOAOOD wireless security camera solar panel adopts a concave-convex particle surface design, which can improve the photoelectric conversion efficiency by 20%, only need 2 hours of sunlight a day to maintain 365 days of uninterrupted protection of your family, no need to remove it to charge. The trouble of charging the camera. Even without the sun, the 5000mAh battery capacity can keep it running for 1-3 months.

【Color Night Vision & 1080P FHD Image】This WiFi camera adopts the latest floodlight design, with two more 45-lumen floodlights than other cameras, which can provide higher-definition full-color night vision and comprehensively improve the night vision effect; in addition, due to the design of the floodlight, The camera can also provide audible and visual alarms, with dazzling lights and a piercing alarm sound when someone breaks into your yard; driving away intruders.

【PIR Alarm & Optional Alarm Zone】DF220 outdoor security camera has PIR human body infrared detection, which can effectively reduce false alarms caused by insect pests, leaves, rain and snow, etc.; optional alarm area, only alarm the area you care about. When the camera detects motion, it will also send you a message in time to remind you what happened. Become a loyal guardian of your home, so that you no longer need to worry about accidents at home.

【IP66 Weatherproof & Multifunction】Our surveillance camera is made of high molecular polyester material, which can well resist all kinds of bad weather and protect your family at all times. In addition, the camera also has a two-way talk function, which allows you to talk directly to the person under the camera. Share with your family, view multiple cameras at the same time, keep an eye on who or what is important.

【Reliable Products & Customer Satisfaction Service】The product provides a one-year warranty service, you can buy with confidence. We adhere to the principle of customer first and serve customers wholeheartedly. If you encounter any problems during use, please feel free to contact us. FOAOOD will provide you with timely and professional technical support and provide you with a satisfactory solution.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Notice: The camera does not support 5Ghz WiFi, only 2.4Ghz WiFi. SD card not included.

Note： The camera only supports connecting to 2.4Ghz WiFi, not support 5Ghz WiFi.If you cannot connect, please check whether your WiFi is a 2.4G independent WiFi, and the WiFi password should not exceed 18 digits.When installing the solar panel, please make sure that the solar panel is in a position where the sun shines directly, and there are no buildings or trees blocking it, otherwise the camera may not be able to be charged.RTSP/ONVIF/NVR/FTP is not supported, ALexa and Google Assistant are not supported.Only supports smartphones and tablets, not PC/Windows.Compatible with CloudPlus and CloudEdge APP.If there is a situation that the memory card(Not included) cannot be recognized： Before inserting the TF card, please use your computer to format the TF card to FAT32 format. Please unplug/insert the TF card in the off state. Please use class 10 and above high-speed TF card. 8-64GB TF card is recommended.

Resolution 1080P Night Vision Color NightVision/Infrared Night Vision Wifi Standard IEEE 802.11 b/g/n, 2.4G( Only support 2.4Ghz wifi, not support 5Ghz wifi) Battery Capacity 5000 mAh Video Format H.264 video compression Storage Type TF Card/Cloud Storage (TF card max support 128G) Battery Life 2 years System Compatible Andorid 4.3 and above/IOS 9.0 and above Device sharing Support up to 5 people sharing a device View on Multiple Devices View up to 4 devices simultaneously

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great camera for the price!! No wires!!
reviews.reviewText: Solar-Powered Wireless Camera.Fiorenzo BendottiWrite an extensive 5 star review for the DF220 wireless camera powered with solar panels.These are the frayiyand specificationsSolar Camera with 5000mAh Built-in Battery] This surveillance camera has a built -in 5000mAh electricity, equipped with solar panels, so that it can maintain continuous electricity for 365 days. When there is a sun during the day, it can be charged for the camera. When there is no sun at night, use battery power to protect your family's safety. (Please note that solar panels need to be installed in a place where the solar is direct.)🌃[2 Floodlights Color Night Vision] This WiFi camera equipped with 2 floodlights, gives you color night vision, capturing the image as good as the daytime, even at night. 1080P picture quality, providing you with HD images without taking up too much network, maintaining the smoothness of the video.🚶 [Intelligent PIR Detection] DF220 outdoor safety camera has PIR human infrared detection, which can reduce false alarms caused by insects, leaves, rain, rain and snow. Only detect people to ensure that every message you receive is important news. In addition, you can also turn on the sound and light alarm. When the camera detects the action, it can also make sounds and flashes to expel the invaders.🛠【Multifunction Solar Camera】IP66: Our surveillance camera is made of high molecular polyester material, which can well resist all kinds of bad weather and protect your family at all times. 2 Way Talk: the camera also has a two-way talk function, which allows you to talk directly to the person under the camera. Share with your family, view multiple cameras at the same time, keep an eye on who or what is important.💌【Reliable Products and Satisfied Service】We adhere to the principle of customer first and serve customers wholeheartedly. If you encounter any problems during use, please feel free to contact us. IHOXTX will provide you with timely and professional technical support and provide you with a satisfactory solutionI recently purchased the DF220 wireless camera powered with solar panels and I must say I am impressed with its performance. This is a 5-star product and I highly recommend it to anyone looking for a reliable surveillance camera for their home or business.The first thing that caught my attention about this camera is the fact that it is powered by solar panels, which means that I don't have to worry about changing batteries or connecting it to a power source. The built-in 5000mAh battery is enough to keep the camera running for 365 days, and even on days when there is no sun, it can still be powered by the battery.The camera is equipped with 2 floodlights that provide color night vision, which is perfect for capturing clear images even in low-light conditions. The 1080P picture quality is exceptional and the video is smooth without taking up too much network bandwidth.The intelligent PIR detection is another feature that I love about this camera. It can detect human movement and reduces false alarms caused by insects, leaves, rain, and snow. This means that every alert I receive is an important one, and I can rest easy knowing that my family and property are safe.The camera is also very easy to use and has multiple functions. It is made of high molecular polyester material that is durable and can withstand all kinds of weather. The two-way talk function allows me to communicate with anyone under the camera, which is great for monitoring deliveries or speaking to visitors.Overall, I am very satisfied with my purchase of the DF220 wireless camera. If you are looking for a high-quality surveillance camera that is easy to use and provides excellent performance, then this is the camera for you. I highly recommend it! Hopefully they keep updating the software and allow for even longer recording time on SD card than 30 seconds per event.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars FOAOOD Solar Powered Security Camera - Uncompromised Peace of Mind
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I recently acquired the FOAOOD Solar Powered Security Camera, and I am absolutely thrilled with its performance and the unmatched peace of mind it has brought into my life.First and foremost, the solar-powered feature is a game-changer. It's incredibly eco-friendly and cost-effective, as it harnesses the power of the sun to keep the camera running continuously. No more worrying about dead batteries or complicated wiring – this camera is always ready to protect your property.The FOAOOD Security Camera offers a wide range of advanced features that make it stand out from the crowd. Its high-resolution video quality is crystal clear, providing a comprehensive view of the surroundings. The day and night vision capabilities ensure that you can monitor your property 24/7 without any compromises.The motion detection technology is highly sensitive and customizable, which means you won't miss a thing. Whether it's a delivery, a pet in the yard, or any potential security concern, the FOAOOD Camera captures it all and sends instant notifications to your phone. The two-way audio function is another great addition, allowing you to communicate with visitors or deter intruders from anywhere.The setup process was surprisingly simple and user-friendly. Even for someone like me with minimal technical expertise, I had the camera up and running in no time. The FOAOOD app is intuitive and easy to navigate, making it a breeze to adjust settings and view live or recorded footage.I'm particularly impressed with the camera's durability and weather resistance. It's built to withstand the harshest outdoor conditions, ensuring reliable performance year-round. Rain or shine, the FOAOOD Camera is always on guard.The storage options are versatile, offering both local and cloud storage solutions. You have the freedom to choose the one that suits your needs best, ensuring that your valuable footage is safely stored and easily accessible.With the FOAOOD Solar Powered Security Camera in place, I can confidently say that my home is secure, and I can keep an eye on my property no matter where I am. It's brought peace of mind that's truly invaluable. I highly recommend the FOAOOD Camera to anyone in search of a reliable, eco-friendly, and feature-rich security solution. It's a top-notch product that exceeds expectations!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Ordered the camera for Christmas. The camera arrived when promised. It was inexpensive, and works quite well. Setup was a breeze. Enjoy the included solar panel that keeps the camera charged. Video picture is clear. There is an option to save videos to the cloud, although I've opted to initially store videos on a local micro SD card.

reviews.reviewTitle: Affordable and Feature-Rich: A Top-Notch WiFi Camera with Excellent Performance
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased a wifi camera from this brand, and I must say I'm thoroughly impressed. The affordability at this price point is astounding, especially given the robust features it offers.Setting it up was a breeze, and the installation process was smooth and user-friendly. The camera provides crystal clear images both during the day and at night, ensuring top-notch security and monitoring.One of the features I appreciate the most is the cloud storage option, allowing me to have access to my footage on the go. Plus, the ability to expand the storage with an SD card is a valuable addition.The accompanying app is intuitive and makes the camera very easy to use, enabling seamless navigation and control. Furthermore, the two-way audio communication is a fantastic feature, allowing me to communicate with people in front of the camera, whether I need to talk to them or simply listen.Lastly, I want to mention the impressive battery life, which has been consistently reliable and long-lasting.Overall, I highly recommend this wifi camera for its quality, convenience, and incredible value for money. A 5-star product in my book!

Tercera cámara del mismo modelo que compró en menos de doce meses para ampliar la zona de registro.Buena calidad de imagen y de conexión a la red wifi, aunque este a 10 metros de distancia del router.Buen sistema de carga, aunque estoy viendo que en invierno debido a la posición del sol, una de ellas recibe menos horas de luz, y carga menos. Lo he arreglado con un cable para acercar la placa a una zona mejor.La detección de movimiento funciona bien. Detecta el movimiento de un perro a unos 5-6 metros sin problema. A las personas mucho mejor.La app de control bien, se ha actualizado al menos una vez. Es fácil y sencilla de controlar.El precio creo que no ha variado nada este año. La he recomendado para controlar una finca y están encantados con ella.
Bon fonctionnement image nickel recharge parfaite avec un panneau bon rapport qualit Prix prends la wifi hyper loin tres très bonne réception

Questa è la seconda che acquisto, dopo aver testato per bene e con successo la prima, per coprire aree esterne senza possibilità di presa di corrente.Quindi il primo bisogno è l'autonomia energetica e nulla da dire: basta caricarla al 100% prima di installarla poi col suo pannellino solare, anche in lunghi periodi di brutto tempo (settimana d'acqua tipica dell'autunno del nord), difficilmente scende sotto l'80% di carica. Su questo fronte assolutamente promossa, da valutare durata del pannellino (esposto agli elementi) nel tempo.Qualità delle riprese non al top ma giustificabile visto il costo (non possono certo metterci sensori al top e lenti Zeiss). Forse meglio quelle notturne (che ho lasciato in B/N) che quelle diurne, comunque assolutamente adeguate in ogni condizione di luce. Anche l'illuminazione IR notturna è OK, buon cono di visibilità (tanto dipende anche dal posizionamento). Personalmente le ho installate con una piccola tettoia sopra per evitare che quando piove l'obiettivo si ricopra di gocce, ma talvolta con eventi seri (temporali) capita che per qualche tempo la visibilità sia un po' compromessa e/o appannata. Un trattamento anti-goccia non farebbe schifo ma per il costo non si può davvero pretendere. Quindi promossa anche su questo fronte.Sensibilità del PIR. Buono e talvolta percepisce movimenti anche a 15 metri e oltre di distanza, tanto che di notte la causa del movimento (spesso animali) si intravede a mala pena nella ripresa, nella zona in ombra dall'illuminazione IR. Unico problema è che talvolta, coi raggi del sole bassi (alba/tramonto d'estate, più spesso autunno/inverno) si attiva il PIR e parte l'allarme (e si attiva la registrazione). Inoltre prima di trovare la corretta sensibilità (regolabile da App) bisogna fare alcune prove in quanto dipende tanto da posizionamento, luce diretta e altri fattori (es. piante nei pressi che si muovono al vento). Quindi diciamo funzionalità probabilmente migliorabile ma assolutamente adeguata.Connettività Wi-FI. Usa solo 2,4GHz (ma va bene così) e la connessione è decisamente stabile e adeguatamente veloce malgrado la fonte di segnale Wi-Fi non sia vicinissima (quasi 40 metri) e dentro casa. Salvo condizioni meteo particolari manda allarmi, si collega e riproduce senza problemi. Connettività decisamente OK.Installazione e gestione con l'App (io uso CloudEdge) davvero facili e senza problemi (con un minimo di dimestichezza con questi dispositivi).Un difetto? L'audio in ingresso. Talvolta gracchia un po' sia in presa diretta che in registrazione ma nulla di drammatico. Da valutare inoltre se colpa della videocamera o da eventuali disturbi elettromagnetici esterni; nei pressi ad esempio c'è una recinzione elettrica (anti-cinghiali) ad alto voltaggio e potrebbe dipendere da quello (dovrei provare a spostarle per verificare ma non essendo un gran problema me ne faccio una ragione).Conclusioni: considerato il costo (spesso anche ridotto grazie al coupon) per me un best buy.

Cameras are good. They do charge with the solar panels. But during winter weather you will have the take the cameras down once every 2 weeks for some extra charging.App could be easier to navigate. But it works ok.
